data.title: ComScore Inc Executive & Employee Information
data.meta_description: GlobalData provides latest information on ComScore Inc employees, including CEO details, executives and full board of directors.
data.text:
Mr. Jon Carpenter has been the Chief Executive Officer of the company since July 2022. Prior to this, he served as the Chief Financial Officer and Treasurer of the company from 2021 to 2022. Prior to this, he served as Chief Financial Officer at Publishers Clearing House in 2016. Previously, he served as the Chief Financial Officer at Nielsen, Sears Holdings, and NBC Universal. Mr. Carpenter began his career with General Electric in the GE Financial Management Program.

Ms. Mary Margaret Curry has been the Chief Financial Officer and Treasurer of the company since July 2022. Prior to this, he served as Chief Accounting Officer of the company from 2021 to 2022; Senior Vice President and Controller of comScore. Ms. Curry also served at KPMG for nine years. She joined the company in 2011 and held various roles including as Global Tax Director from August 2011 to July 2015, Senior Director of Global Tax Compliance and Reporting from July 2015 to May 2018, Vice President of Tax and Treasury from May 2018 to November 2020 and Senior Vice President and Controller from November 2020 to December 2021.

Mr. Greg Dale has been the Chief Operating Officer of the company since August 2022. Previously, he served as the Chief Operating Officer at Shareablee. Prior to this, he served as the Chief Operating Officer at Persado from April 2016 to February 2018. Mr. Dale also worked with data and analytics firm Information Resources, Inc.
